results.title: Role of metformin in inflammation.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: The relevant literatures on pubmed and other websites for reading, classification and sorting, and did not involve any animal experiments. CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects through multiple routes, which provides potential therapeutic targets for certain @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory diseases@@@, such as @<m>DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@neuroinflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@.
